sentences.en: Fresh air and nutritious food will speed his recovery.
sentences.cn: 呼吸新鲜空气,吃有营养的食物会促进他身体的康复.

sentences.en: Hummingbirds have discovered that nectar and pollen are very nutritious.
sentences.cn: 蜂鸟发现花蜜和花粉是很有营养的.

sentences.en: If you always assumed that tomatoes are very nutritious, you'reabsolutely right.
sentences.cn: 如果你一直都认为番茄非常有营养, 那么你绝对是正确的.

sentences.en: It is always important to choose enjoyable, nutritious foods.
sentences.cn: 选择好吃的、营养价值高的食物总是很重要。

sentences.en: Many tasty and nutritious meals can be rustled up in next to no time.
sentences.cn: 转眼之间就能准备好很多营养可口的饭菜。

sentences.en: Nectar and pollen are very nutritious.
sentences.cn: 花蜜和花粉是很有营养的.

sentences.en: Nuts and fruit make nutritious snacks.
sentences.cn: 坚果和水果是有营养价值的零食。

sentences.en: Oats provide good, nutritious food for horses.
sentences.cn: 燕麦是营养丰富的优质马饲料。

sentences.en: Some ready made meals are nutritious and very easy to prepare.
sentences.cn: 一些预制膳食很有营养，而且烹调起来很简单。
既可口又有营养的饭菜

sentences.en: The cookbook contains many simple yet highly nutritious meals.
sentences.cn: 那本烹饪书里有许多简单却营养价值很高的食谱。

sentences.en: The flu strikes when people are too tired, stressed and not eating nutritious food.
sentences.cn: 当人们太劳累 、 压力太大、营养不够时,流感就会袭击他们.

sentences.en: The honey they produce is pure and highly nutritious.
sentences.cn: 住在温泉的人多半喜欢吃这种蜜,滋养精神.

sentences.en: The plain but nutritious breakfast was taken by all three in sombre silence.
sentences.cn: 三个人在悲怆和沉默中用完了简单而营养丰富的饭菜.

sentences.en: To help provide essential nourishment, we've put together these nutritious drinks.
sentences.cn: 为了帮助提供必要的营养，我们调配了这些营养饮料。

sentences.en: Wholemeal bread is more nutritious than white bread.
sentences.cn: 全麦面包比白面包更有营养。

words.tran_cn: 有营养的；滋养的；有营养成份的；与营养有关的
营养物；促进生长的东西

trans.tran_en: food that is nutritious is full of the natural substances that your body needs to stay healthy or to grow properly
